title: Fs: T206 joe tinker (bat on shoulder) psa 6mc!!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Fs: T206 joe tinker (bat on shoulder) psa 6mc!!
posts.post_content: Sweet cap 350-460 factory 30 back. Card is razor sharp but slightly off centered top to bottom (all of the letters are intact). Straight psa 6's are bringing $1,000 and up. First $375 gets it. Please email me for scans....thanks
